_header: Some while I was with sin I-bound
Note:
See 442, 1954 for the end of this work preserved separately; and 1907 for extracts totalling 260 lines inserted in one MS of the ‘Northern Passion’, printed Foster (1913)
XFoster, Frances Allen. The Northern Passion.
EETS o.s. 145, 147 (1913, 1916); repr. 1971.
Subjects: translations; scripture texts, paraphrases; Christ, life of
_description: La Estorie del Euangelie — 1876 lines in monorhyming quatrains

BodAddC38.Editions:
Campbell,  Gertrude H. 
             “The Middle English ‘Evangelie.’” 
             PMLA
         30 (1915): 529-613, 851-3: 545-610.
Millward,  Celia,
                        ed.  
             The Estorie del Evangelie: A Parallel-Text Edition.
Middle English Texts
         30. Heidelberg: Winter, 1998.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Sum while ich was wiþ sunne i boundeAnd sunne me hath icast to
                    grounde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He schal his of sunne bringeAs crist and lord of alle
                    þinge…
BodEngPoeta1.Note: 396 lines; ends imperfectly due to loss of folios 106-113.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: la estorie del Euangelie en engleis (f. 105ra)

Dulwich22.First Lines:
Sum whyle i was wyt sinne ibundeAnt sinne me hauid cast to
                    grunde…
Dulwich22.Last Lines:
…Ant of nazaret him bi gan to hyeAnt to bethleem weys
                    guye…
Dulwich22.Editions:

UnivLonSLV17.First Lines:
[S]um while iwas with synne ibounde& synne me haþ i caste
                    to brounde…
UnivLonSLV17.Last Lines:
…ffor wo hem was of þe tyþynge& serew made &
                    grete mornynge…

Millward,  Celia,
                        ed.
